mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sm_orderlist ( F_ORDERLISTID , F_ORDERID , F_SPID , F_VENID , F_VENNAME , F_PRICEID , F_PRODUCTID , F_PRODUCTNAME , F_PRICE , F_NUM , F_COUPON_MONEY , F_CUSTOMERCOUPONID , F_MONEY , F_PAYMONEY , F_BACKNUM , F_GOODSPRICEID , F_CHILDNAME , F_TRANSFEE , F_DELFLAG , F_ORDERLISTTYPE ) VALUES ( #{orderListId} , #{orderId} , #{spId} , #{venId} , #{venName} , #{priceId} , #{productId} , #{productName} , #{price} , #{num} , #{couponMoney} , #{customerCouponId} , #{money} , #{payMoney} , #{backNum} , #{goodsPriceId} , #{childName} , #{transFee} , #{delFlag} , #{orderListType} )

REPLACE INTO t_sm_orderlist ( F_ORDERLISTID , F_ORDERID , F_SPID , F_VENID , F_VENNAME , F_PRICEID , F_PRODUCTNAME , F_PRICE , F_NUM , F_MONEY , F_PAYMONEY , F_BACKNUM , F_GOODSPRICEID , F_CHILDNAME , F_TRANSFEE , F_DELFLAG , F_ORDERLISTTYPE ) VALUES ( #{orderListId} , #{orderId} , #{spId} , #{venId} , #{venName} , #{priceId} , #{productName} , #{price} , #{num} , #{money} , #{payMoney} , #{backNum} , #{goodsPriceId} , #{childName} , #{transFee} , #{delFlag} , #{orderListType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t.F_ORDERLISTID as orderListId , t.F_ORDERID as orderId , t.F_SPID as spId , t.F_VENID as venId , t.F_VENNAME as venName , t.F_PRICEID as priceId , t.F_PRODUCTID as productId , t.F_PRODUCTNAME as productName , t.F_PRICE as price , t.F_NUM as num , t.F_COUPON_MONEY as couponMoney , t.F_CUSTOMERCOUPONID as customerCouponId , t.F_MONEY as money , t.F_PAYMONEY as payMoney , t.F_BACKNUM as backNum , t.F_GOODSPRICEID as goodsPriceId , t.F_CHILDNAME as childName , t.F_TRANSFEE as transFee , t.F_DELFLAG as delFlag , t.F_ORDERLISTTYPE as orderListType , gs.F_THUMBPIC as thumbPic FROM t_sm_orderlist t LEFT JOIN t_sm_goodsprice gs on t.F_GOODSPRICEID = gs.F_GOODSPRICEID
t.F_ORDERLISTID = #{orderListId}

select orderTemp.F_MONEY as money, ifnull(backTemp.F_BACKMONEY,0) as backMoney, orderTemp.F_PAYDATEMONTH as payDateTime, orderTemp.F_MONEY - ifnull(backTemp.F_BACKMONEY,0) as surplusMoney from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(o.F_PAYDATE,'%Y-%m') as F_PAYDATEMONTH,
DATE_FORMAT(o.F_PAYDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as F_PAYDATEMONTH,
IFNULL(sum(t.F_MONEY),0) AS F_MONEY FROM t_sm_orderlist t LEFT JOIN t_sm_order o ON t.F_ORDERID = o.F_ORDERID where t.F_ORDERLISTTYPE='0' and o.F_PAYTAG='1'
AND t.F_VENID = #{venId}
AND o.F_PAYDATE >= #{payDateTimeStart}
AND o.F_PAYDATE <= #{payDateTimeEnd}
GROUP BY F_PAYDATEMONTH ) orderTemp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(b.F_APPLYTIME,'%Y-%m') as F_PAYDATEMONTH,
DATE_FORMAT(b.F_APPLYTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as F_PAYDATEMONTH,
IFNULL(sum(t.F_MONEY),0) AS F_BACKMONEY FROM t_sm_orderlist t LEFT JOIN t_sm_order o ON t.F_ORDERID = o.F_ORDERID LEFT JOIN t_sm_orderback b on t.F_ORDERID = b.F_ORDERID and t.F_ORDERLISTTYPE='1' where (t.F_ORDERLISTTYPE='1' or t.F_ORDERLISTTYPE='2') and o.F_PAYTAG='1'
AND t.F_VENID = #{venId}
AND b.F_APPLYTIME >= concat(#{payDateTimeStart},' 00:00:00')
AND b.F_APPLYTIME <= concat(#{payDateTimeEnd},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY F_PAYDATEMONTH ) backTemp on orderTemp.F_PAYDATEMONTH = backTemp.F_PAYDATEMONTH order by orderTemp.F_PAYDATEMONTH DESC
